name: The Crystal Guardians
description:
Play as a hunter who is part of an organization that protects space crystals in this top down stealth collectible game! Your job is to infiltrate an evil robot base and get back the crystals.

I made this as part of a university assignment. It was back-breaking but I'm happy with the outcome. Feedback is appreciated!! :)

Some known issues (that I tried to fix) are:

Improper scaling with UI

Steps are still counted at a rapid rate when collecting crystals

Camera is in a fixed position thus will lead to awkward movements sometimes.

------

This game requires a mouse to play.

This game is solely made for educational purposes. It is free to play and no payment/donations will be accepted.
